00022 template<class T> class CArray {
00023     public:
00024         typedef T ElemType;
00025 
00026         inline CArray(const T *arr, INT size) : m_size(size), m_arr(arr) {};
00027 
00028         inline INT Size() const { return m_size; };
00029         inline const T& operator[](INT i) const { return m_arr[i]; };
00030 
00031     private:
00032         INT m_size;
00033         const T *m_arr;
00034 };

00037 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     BinarySearch
00039     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00040 template<class Collection, class Key, class Pred> inline
00041     INT BinarySearch(const Collection &arr, const Key &key)
00042 {
00043     return BinarySearch(arr, key, Pred(), 0);
00044 }   // BinarySearch
00045 
00046 
00047 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     BinarySearch
00049     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00050 template<class Collection, class Key, class Pred> inline
00051     INT BinarySearch(const Collection &arr, const Key &key, const Pred &pred)
00052 {
00053     return BinarySearch(arr, key, pred, 0);
00054 }   // BinarySearch
00055 
00056 
00057 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     BinarySearch
00059     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00060 template<class Collection, class Key, class Pred> inline
00061     INT BinarySearch(const Collection &arr, const Key &key, const Pred &pred, INT *insert)
00062 {
00063     INT left = 0;
00064     INT right = arr.Size() - 1;
00065     INT middle = 0;
00066 
00067     while (right >= left) {
00068         middle = (left + right) / 2;
00069         INT result = pred.Compare(key, arr[middle]);
00070 
00071         if (result == 0)
00072             return middle;
00073 
00074         if (result < 0)
00075             right = middle - 1;
00076         else
00077             left = middle + 1;
00078     }
00079 
00080     if (insert != 0)
00081         *insert = middle;
00082 
00083     return -1;
00084 }   // BinarySearch
00085
